text: Tower of Saviors is a video game which is developed in Hong Kong. Since July 2013, this game has been downloaded over 5,000,000 times. Seventy-five percent of players are Taiwanese. == Copying issue == The gameplay and characters are similar to Puzzle & Dragons, a Japanese game. The person in charge said that the game has referenced other games, such as Puzzle & Dragons. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Tower of Saviors Category:2013 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:IOS games
title: Tower of Saviors
